title: cendUril sirappOnai
sahitya:
cendUril sirappOnai vandanai purindu nAm enda nALum inbam eidiDuvOm


anupallavi

  bandha pAsham mighunda indak-kAsiniyil nondu ayarnduLam vendu varundAmal


caraNam    tandaiyum tAtum bandhu mitrarum sonda manaivi makkaL sOdari sOdararum
enda vidattilumE tandiDa muDiyAda cintai serindiDum shAnti niraindiDavE
